ComicInfo.Title: Bugs the Squids
ComicInfo.Summary: The Squid Gang crash the party for some very rich people. But Blue Beetle is their to thwart their attempts. Once the Blue Beetle stops their attempts at a heist in the apartment, they flee. They spring back up at a boat and almost succeed in escaping with their loot when the Blue Beetle crashes the party once again. And this time they put up a fight but soon Ted is able to capture them and hand them over to the police. Who is The Question In the Questions first debut he uncovers a mans racketeering ring. And is able to catch the mans shady dealings on camera and the authorities are able to arrest him.
ComicInfo.Characters: Jim Lark, Lou Dicer, Squid Gang, Ted Kord, Vic Sage
